getPrompt().Description: Prefer @B_android#service#voice#VoiceInteractionSession#ConfirmationRequest#getVoicePrompt_E@ which allows multiple voice prompts. Return the prompt informing the user of what will happen, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#ConfirmationRequest_E@.
getPrompt().history: Added in API level 23 Deprecated in API level 23

getVoicePrompt().Description: Return the prompt informing the user of what will happen, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#ConfirmationRequest_E@.

sendConfirmationResult(boolean,android.o.Description: Report that the voice interactor has confirmed the operation with the user, resulting in a call to @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#ConfirmationRequest#onConfirmationResult_E@. This finishes the request (it is no longer active).
sendConfirmationResult(boolean,android.o.FullName: public void sendConfirmationResult (boolean confirmed, Bundle result)
